<pr_analysis>
- Looking at commit history, this branch has made one commit: "chore(core): add todo comment"
- The diff shows various changes across multiple files including:
  - TypeScript configuration updates in nx-dev/tutorial/tsconfig.json
  - Package dependency version updates in package.json (bumping @nx versions from beta.1 to beta.4)
  - Enhancements to TypeScript transformer loading in packages/js/src/utils/typescript/
  - Addition of new mock files for testing TypeScript transformers
  - Addition of comprehensive test suite for HashPlanInspector functionality
- The changes appear to focus on improving TypeScript transformer support and adding testing capabilities for hash plan inspection
- The main purpose seems to be updating dependencies and enhancing TypeScript plugin functionality while adding comprehensive testing
</pr_analysis>

Now I'll push the branch and create the pull request:

input.description: Push branch to remote with upstream tracking

input.command:
gh pr create --title "chore(core): add todo comment and enhance TypeScript transformer support" --body "$(cat <<'EOF'
## Current Behavior

The codebase had a basic TypeScript transformer loading mechanism that only supported standard plugin formats and lacked comprehensive testing for hash plan inspection functionality.

## Expected Behavior

With these changes, the TypeScript transformer loading now supports multiple plugin formats including function-based transformers, and comprehensive testing is added for hash plan inspection capabilities.

## Changes Made

- Enhanced TypeScript transformer loading to support function-based plugins
- Added comprehensive test coverage for different transformer plugin formats
- Updated dependency versions from 21.2.0-beta.1 to 21.2.0-beta.4
- Added HashPlanInspector test suite with thorough coverage
- Fixed TypeScript configuration in nx-dev/tutorial

## Related Issue(s)

This PR includes general maintenance updates and improvements to the TypeScript transformer system.

Fixes #N/A
EOF
)"
